contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 3, 2018 D Wychavon Contest (Championship Section)
Wychavon Contest (Championship Section) 1 Entertainments Contest Wychavon Festival of Brass wychavon-contest-championship-section
De Montfort (High) School, Evesham, Worcestershire, England, UK Invitation to 2019 Spring Festival: Verwood Concert Brass Winning conductor: Russell Gray (Filton Concert Brass) Most entertaining: Filton Concert Brass Best soloist: Anthony Smith (euphonium, Filton Concert Brass) Best baritones: Aldbourne Best percussion: Aldbourne Youngest player: Owen Yarrow (Aveley & Newham, aged 12) Prizes - 1st £1250, 2nd £650, 3rd £325. 17 bands competed.
Feb. 16, 2018, 11:21 a.m. July 9, 2020, 9:47 a.m.
1 Filton Concert Brass Band Russell Gray
2 Aldbourne Band Chris King
3 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Dewi Griffiths
4 Eccles Borough Band Mareika Gray
5 Verwood Concert Brass Kevin Smith
6 St. Austell Town Band Steve Sykes
7 Thoresby Colliery David Holling
8 Foresters Brass John Davis
9 Aveley and Newham Band Alan Duguid
9 Roberts Bakery Band Paul Lovatt-Cooper
9 BTM Band Jeff Hutcherson
12 Medway Band Nicholas Garman
13 Harrogate Band Dean Jones
14 Langley Band Cliff Parker
15 Sandhurst Silver Russ Young
16 Mount Charles Brass Band Jeremy Taylor
17 Regent Brass Paul Archibald
Withdrawn Ebbw Valley Brass Gareth Ritter
